price: Whatever good they do, their reward will never be denied; for Allah is All-Knowing of those who are righteous.
arabic: وَمَا يَفۡعَلُواْ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَلَن يُكۡفَرُوهُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
